sentences.en: After several burglaries in the area, security is now a high priority (= very important and needing attention soon ) .
sentences.cn: 该地区发生了几宗入室盗窃案以后，治安成了当务之急。

sentences.en: Being a parent is her first priority.
sentences.cn: 做好母亲是她的头等大事。

sentences.en: Cleaning up the water supply is their top priority.
sentences.cn: 清洁供水系统是他们的当务之急。

sentences.en: I want to start work on the garden but the house must take priority .
sentences.cn: 我想开始整修花园，不过还是先得打扫屋子。

sentences.en: List your tasks in order of priority (= most important first ) .
sentences.cn: 按照轻重缓急列出你的工作。

sentences.en: Low achievers in schools will receive priority.
sentences.cn: 重点将放在学校里的后进生身上。

sentences.en: Members receive priority bookings and reduced ticket prices to all concerts.
sentences.cn: 会员可优先预订所有音乐会的门票，并享受优惠票价。

sentences.en: Priority will be given to those who apply early.
sentences.cn: 早申请者将获优先考虑。

sentences.en: Protection of sites, habitats and landscapes is of uppermost priority.
sentences.cn: 保护遗址、栖息地和风景区是重中之重。

sentences.en: Reducing class sizes should be a top priority.
sentences.cn: 削减班级规模应该是首选方案。

sentences.en: Single parents got priority in the housing queue.
sentences.cn: 单亲父母在申请住房时享有优先权。

sentences.en: Small residential areas have become a priority with the Ministry of Construction.
sentences.cn: 建设居民小区是建设部要优先解决的问题.

sentences.en: Spain's top priority is the signing of an EMU treaty.
sentences.cn: 西班牙的当务之急是签署《欧洲经济和货币联盟条约》。

sentences.en: The club’s priority is to win the League.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部首先考虑的是要赢得联赛。

sentences.en: The customer is high on our list of priorities .
sentences.cn: 顾客在我们的心目中排在第一位。

sentences.en: The development of the national economy is a top priority.
sentences.cn: 发展国民经济是应予以最优先考虑的事.

sentences.en: The first priority is to cut costs.
sentences.cn: 当务之急是降低成本。

sentences.en: The proposals deserve support as they give priority to the needs of children.
sentences.cn: 这些提议值得拥护，因为它们优先考虑了儿童的需求。

sentences.en: The school will give priority to science, maths and modern languages.
sentences.cn: 学校将重点发展理科、数学和现代语言。

sentences.en: Things should be taken up in order of priority.
sentences.cn: 办事应有个先后次序.

sentences.en: With so little money available, repairs must remain a low priority (= not important and not needing attention soon ) .
sentences.cn: 可用的钱这么少，只好暂时放下维修事宜了。

sentences.en: Write down (in order of priority) the qualities you'd like to have.
sentences.cn: （按照优先次序）写下你想具有的品质。

words.tran_cn: 把事情按优先顺序排好

phrases.tran_cn: 共享颐年优先配屋计划
次重要优先项目(或问题)
优先秩序，轻重缓急次序
优先邮件（美国邮政的邮件类型之一，在邮件分检系统内享有优先处理的特权）
制定优先次序；优先级设立

trans.tran_en: the thing that you think is most important and that needs attention before anything else
